unnormalised: Automotive Buzz: Mileage Mania Grips India!
normalised: Automotive Buzz: Mileage Mania Grips India!

unnormalised: Fuel efficiency is the garam masala of car buying right now, especially with those petrol prices hitting the roof, right? From Kerala to Kashmir, everyone's talking about 'kitna deti hai?' before even thinking about bhp.
normalised: Fuel efficiency is the garam masala of car buying right now, especially with those petrol prices hitting the roof, right? From Kerala to Kashmir, everyone's talking about 'kitna deti hai?' before even thinking about b h p.

unnormalised: New reports are showing that Tata Motors and Maruti Suzuki are leading the pack in delivering the best km per litre in the hatchback segment. People are trading in their SUVs for these more efficient options, thinking ahead to Diwali travels and saving some serious Rs.
normalised: New reports are showing that Tata Motors and Maruti Suzuki are leading the pack in delivering the best kilometer per liter in the hatchback segment. People are trading in their S U V s for these more efficient options, thinking ahead to Diwali travels and saving some serious rupees.

unnormalised: Even the IIT Madras is reportedly working on some cutting-edge engine tech that promises even better mileage in the future. Imagine, more road trips to Goa without emptying your wallet at every pump!
normalised: Even the I I T Madras is reportedly working on some cutting-edge engine tech that promises even better mileage in the future. Imagine, more road trips to Goa without emptying your wallet at every pump!

unnormalised: And honestly, who wants to spend all their money on fuel when they could be buying delicious biryani and enjoying Onam festivities? It's all about balance, folks! Keep an eye out for upcoming reviews and compare those kmpl figures before you drive off the lot!
normalised: And honestly, who wants to spend all their money on fuel when they could be buying delicious biryani and enjoying Onam festivities? It's all about balance, folks! Keep an eye out for upcoming reviews and compare those kilometer per liter figures before you drive off the lot!
